node.accessibility_caption: Image may contain: text that says 'TRAUMA A girl who has lived through trauma has lived through a situation where her body, her mind, her self was not her own. Where she felt disjointed, ripped from her self, safety, and anity. It was a moment, an experienc a something where her trust was smashed, her worth was gone and all there was was pain.'

node.text:
#pleaselovemeanyway
.
Powerful post from @beatanxiety.me
.

When she has trauma
✅ love her anyway!
.
▪️When her bouts of irrational rage over the tiniest things cause her to spin out of control
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When her sense of self worth becomes completely negative
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When her desire to overachieve but her near crippling depression causes her nearly always to miss the mark
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When her inability to remember the vast majority of her youth (including my childhood and adolescent years)
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When she is hyper focused and remembers any criticism
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When her hyper focus is on things that she deemed to be embarrassing
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When she feels instances of complete detachment from her thoughts and feelings
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When she has a overwhelming sense of shame and guilt that never seemed to leave her
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When she has skewed feelings towards her abuser; feeling grateful and familial towards them one moment and feeling extreme hatred for them the next
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When she has innate need to be alone all of the time because she was never able to trust anyone
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When she has complete sense of hopelessness and loss of interest in anything that seemed to grow daily
✅ love her anyway!
▪️When she feels totally unloveable
✅ love her anyway!
.
Please feel free to repost (please tag) send, share, and save. And of course tag that person that loves you anyway!
.
.
.
.
